content.en: Improved CTO Treatment: Algorithms are being developed to assist doctors in achieving successful recanalisation of coronary chronic total occlusions, improving patient outcomes. A hybrid algorithm that combines different techniques has been shown to increase success rates and efficiency in percutaneous coronary intervention for chronic total occlusion. This algorithm can even be adopted by operators without prior experience in this procedure. Overall, the use of algorithms in treating chronic total occlusions has led to high success rates, low complication rates, and improved procedural characteristics.
content.da: Forbedret CTO-behandling: Algoritmer udvikles for at hjælpe læger med at opnå succesfuld recanalisering af kroniske totale okklusioner i koronararterierne, hvilket forbedrer patientresultaterne. En hybridalgoritme, der kombinerer forskellige teknikker, har vist sig at øge succesraterne og effektiviteten i perkutan koronar intervention for kronisk total okklusion. Denne algoritme kan endda anvendes af operatører uden tidligere erfaring med denne procedure. Samlet set har brugen af algoritmer i behandlingen af kroniske totale okklusioner ført til høje succesrater, lave komplikationer og forbedrede proceduremæssige egenskaber.
